current.text: Yeah. Well, anyway, it's up to you. But I can tell that you come here often.

text: Really? I bought a same one last week. It's surprising that there is something we both like. Well, what do you think of these ceramic cups?
Come on. They look so cheap. Something else, please.
What about this picture? I think Benjamin would like it.
Don't underestimate his taste. I don't think he'd like it.
Don't be so sure. He loves the vase I bought here last week.
